headline: Microsoft’s Nadella wants us to stop thinking of AI as ‘slop’
summary: Nadella wants us to think of AI as a human helper instead of a slop-generating job killer. New data for 2026 indicates he could be right.

headline: Analysts Love Salesforce Stock and Are Raising Their Price Targets - How to Play CRM
summary: Analysts have been raising their price targets on Salesforce stock. This is despite CRM stock having been flat over the last month. One of the best plays here is to sell short out-of-the-money puts for income.

raw.headline: Analysts Love Salesforce Stock and Are Raising Their Price Targets - How to Play CRM

headline: 5 Reasons Salesforce Could Be One of 2026’s Best Trades

headline: Salesforce: Take A Good Look At Agentforce Before You Invest
summary: Salesforce (CRM) rated Hold: Agentforce growth is small/unproven vs premium valuation. Q3 strong, but AI monetization/ROI unclear.
